class.name: VisualShaderNodeTexture2DArray
class.brief_description: A 2D texture uniform array to be used within the visual shader graph.
class.description: Translated to [code]uniform sampler2DArray[/code] in the shader language.

members.member: A source texture array. Used if [member VisualShaderNodeSample3D.source] is set to [constant VisualShaderNodeSample3D.SOURCE_TEXTURE].
